text: Chirocentrites is an extinct genus of bulldog fish in the family Cladocyclidae. == Description == It resembled a bulldog. == Related pages == * Ichthyodectiformes * Ichthyodectes * Gillicus * Cladocyclus == References == # Fishes of the World by Joseph S. Nelson (page 103) Category:Ichthyodectiformes
title: Chirocentrites
